    • Uses of DebtPosition in pagopa.gov.it.toolkit.debtPositionGenerator.validation

      Methods in pagopa.gov.it.toolkit.debtPositionGenerator.validation with parameters of type DebtPosition 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DebtPositionValidation.validate(DebtPosition debtPosition)
      Validate the debtPosition
      void DebtPositionValidationImpl.validate(DebtPosition debtPosition)
      Validate the debtPosition
      The validation includes: checkConstraints - validation by annotation checkUniqueIdentificationType - if uniqueIdentificationType = G then it must be uniqueIdentificationCode = valid VAT number; if uniqueIdentificationType = F then it must be uniqueIdentificationCode = valid fiscal code checkReceivedIuv - the iuv must be valid; check digit validation checkSinglePaymentsDetailList - the list of DPSinglePaymentDetail must have a maximum of 5 elements checkAmounts - the sum of the amounts in DPSinglePaymentDetail must coincide with the amount in DPPaymentDetail
